Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll

Class CourseRoll

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll.CourseRoll
  • public class CourseRoll
extends java.lang.Object
    Class defining the course roll collection of students for each course in the PackScheduler program.
    Author:
    Hunter Pruitt, jrnolan2, tsoni2
